item.title: Hugo - My First Post - Using Hugo with GitHub Pages
item.description: This is my first Hugo/GitHub Pages post. And here is how it was done. Initial setup Install Chocolatey Open Elevated PowerShell prompt Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1')) Install Hugo using Chocolatey From Elevated PowerShel prompt choco install hugo Create a GitHub repo to host your site Create a Hugo Static site in a local folder
